resources.string: Gorilla photo by Josh Durham on Unsplash. Gorilla sound by Sound Bible (Public Domain).
Chimpanzee photo by Janosch Diggelmann on Unsplash. Chimpanzee sound by Mike Koenig on Sound Bible (Attribution 3.0).
Orangutan photo by Du≈°an veverkolog on Unsplash. Gorilla sound by Sound Bible (Public Domain).
Siamang photo by Joshua J. Cotten on Unsplash. Gibbon sounds by Daniel Simon on Sound Bible (Attribution 3.0).
Click image to switch between gorilla, chimpanzee, orangutan and gibbon.
Move bar right to increase time up to 20 minutes or left to decrease it down to 0 minutes; default time is one minute
Push button to start or stop timer
WARNING: TURN VOLUME DOWN. APE SOUNDS ARE LOUD.
